During study session , healthy male subject administer single oral dose 80 mg gliclazide ( one BF-Gliclazide Tablet 80 mg one Diamicron 80 mg Tablet ) overnight fast approximately 10 hour . 20 % glucose give orally subject 2 h drug administration minimize risk hypoglycaemia . Venous blood sample collect pre-dose ( 0 h ) 72 hour post-dose . The plasma concentration gliclazide determine validated assay . ANOVA conduct logarithmically transform Cmax , AUC0-last AUC0-inf . The two one-sided test use calculate 90 % confidence interval mean difference AUC0-last , AUC0-inf Cmax , assess bioequivalence two product .
